homePage.subtitle: Where sound meets serenity - immerse yourself in concentration, calm or deep sleep

general.headTitle: Auralis — где звук встречается с безмятежностью

policy.title: Data Usage Policy
policy.text1: The Auralis website uses modern technologies such as LocalStorage, IndexedDB, Session Storage, and cookies. They help save your preferences, speed up page loading, and remember your settings.
policy.text2:
Auralis does not use cookies to track you or collect personal information.
 Everything we store is solely to make the site fast, reliable, and pleasant to use.
policy.text3: If you have any questions, feel free to contact me
